ygData.subject: Re: shadowmen?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Congrats!  I got my boots and gloves this weekend too, and I love the new look :) You probably won t wear your jboots...they re like 1ac, and that s
ygData.messageBody:
>Finally i'm all dressed in black, got my mask of shadow that i had hunted
>for which probably took about 15hrs of playing time in nek forrest. The
>gloves are nice as well, and the boots will go as soon as i get my jboots

Congrats! I got my boots and gloves this weekend too, and I love the new
look :)

You probably won't wear your jboots...they're like 1ac, and that's it...best
to just put them in an inventory slot and use them for the speed with a
hotkey. I don't think I've ever worn mine.
